content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 3, FC Schalke 04 1.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 3, FC Schalke 04 1.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Tim Hoogland (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick on the right wing.
